response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a product that holds immense value to me. This unique item is not just an object; it's a testament to craftsmanship and innovation. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special price of $800,000. Given its rarity and significance, I believe this is an exceptional deal that won't be found elsewhere. Please let me know if you're interested in discussing further details or arranging a viewing. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 800000}
